text: Decimomannu (Deximumànnu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 8,133 people lived there. Its area is 27.72 km². It is 10 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Decimomannu
